summary.span: 定义到控件适配器的接口。

span.span: Defines the interface to a control adapter.

summary.span: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 ASP.NET 移动应用和网站。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必须实现所有控件适配器接口。All control adapters must implement the interface. 通常情况下，控件适配器中继承直接或间接从基本类，该类提供此接口的默认实现。Usually, a control adapter inherits directly or indirectly from the base class, which provides a default implementation of this interface.

permission.span: 用于在宿主环境中进行操作。

span.span: for operating in a hosted environment.
Demand value: ; Permission value: .

param.span: 如果实例化模板必须绑定到可用数据（通常在第一次请求时发生），则返回 。

span.span: Returns if the instantiated templates must bind to available data (which usually happens on the first request).

param.span: 如果模板被禁止绑定到数据，而可以使用视图状态进行填充（通常发生在后续回发中），则返回 。

span.span: Returns if the templates must not bind to data, and instead rely on view state to fill them in (which usually happens on subsequent postbacks).

span.span: Called by base classes to create a templated UI.

Public Function HandlePostBackEvent (eventArgument As String) As Boolean

span.span: Name of the event.

summary.span: 如果已处理事件，则返回 。

span.span: Returns if the event was handled.

summary.span: 此 API 已过时。

span.span: This API is obsolete.

summary.span: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 ASP.NET 移动应用和网站。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

returns.span: 如果处理了回发事件，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the postback event was handled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在接收一个回发事件通知，检查事件是否为特定的适配器时，将由控件调用此方法。This method is called by a control when it receives a postback event notification, to check whether the event is adapter specific. 如果该控件实现并接收回发事件，调用控件适配器的方法。If the control implements and receives a postback event, the method of the control adapter is called. 如果向控件发送的事件可以根据目标设备而有所不同，必须调用此方法的控件实现控件适配器的方法。If events sent to the control can vary depending on the target device, the control implementation of this method must call the method of the control adapter. 此方法返回`true`或`false`，以指示设备适配器是否处理该事件。This method returns `true` or `false`, indicating whether the device adapter handled the event. 它将返回`false`默认情况下。It returns `false` by default.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ItemWeight As Integer
public: property int ItemWeight { int get(); };

summary.span: 访问控件中某一项的大致权重。

span.span: Accesses the approximate weight of a single item in the control.

summary.span: 此 API 已过时。

span.span: This API is obsolete.

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

value.span: 控件中单个项的近似权重。

span.span: The approximate weight of a single item in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值为`-1`指示必须使用元素的默认权重。A value of `-1` indicates that the default weight for the element must be used. 继承的类必须重写此属性。The inheriting class must override this property. 有关重写此属性的详细信息，请参阅[分页](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b4f4c4bc-226b-46ec-ae46-00497a32f4f2)。For further information about overriding this property, see [Pagination](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b4f4c4bc-226b-46ec-ae46-00497a32f4f2).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件加载其私有视图状态时调用此方法。This method is called when the control loads its private view state. 设备适配器可以保存控件的特定于适配器的视图。A device adapter can save the adapter-specific view for a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当控件实现调用此方法接口具有其自己方法调用。This method is called when a control that implements the interface has its own method invoked. > [!NOTE] > 不同的设备可能以不同的方式提供其数据返回到调用的服务器。Different devices might provide their data back to the calling server in different ways. 一个示例是如何 WML 和 HTML 报告返回的结果之间的差异。An example is the difference between how WML and HTML report back the results of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以重写此方法以设置特定于设备的属性。You can override this method to set device-specific properties. 继承类可以重写此方法以执行其他任务。Inheriting classes can override this method to perform other tasks. 如果此方法在继承类中重写，必须调用基实现。If this method is overridden in an inheriting class, you must call the base implementation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性用于窗体分页。This property is used for form pagination. 值为`-1`指示必须使用元素的默认权重。A value of `-1` indicates that the default weight for the element must be used. 有关详细信息，请参阅[分页支持](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/78f2786d-0b5b-4760-9616-5027357713c2)。For further information, see [Pagination Support](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/78f2786d-0b5b-4760-9616-5027357713c2).
